SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssetSetter
The AssetSetter class is responsible for setting up various game assets such as objects, NPCs, and monsters.
BattleAnimations
The BattleAnimations class handles the animations for melee and magic attacks in a game.
BattleSystem
The BattleSystem class handles turn-based battles between the player's party and monsters.
CollisionCheck
The CollisionCheck class is responsible for handling collision detection between entities and game elements.
Config
Handles the configuration settings for the game.
DataStorage
This class represents a data storage that holds the player stats, inventory, and objects on the map.
Drawable
The Drawable interface represents objects that can be drawn on a graphical context using the Graphics2D class.
Entity
The abstract base class for all entities in the game.
Entity_stats
This class represents the statistics and equipment of an entity, particularly a player.
EventRect
Represents a rectangular area used for defining events in the game.
Events
Manages and checks events in the game world.
GamePanel
The main panel for the game, responsible for rendering and updating the game state.
KeyHandler
Key handler for the game implementing the KeyListener interface.
Main
Main class for the game.
monsterData
Represents data for a monster, including its name, health, attributes (strength, agility, magic, vitality), level, experience points given upon defeat, attack type, combat image path, weaknesses, resistances, nullifications, repelled elements, and spells.
MonsterManager
Manages the loading and retrieval of monster data from a JSON file.
NegotiationManager
Manages negotiations and handles questions.
NegotiationSystem
Manages the negotiation system in the game.
Node
The Node class represents a node used in pathfinding algorithms.
NPC
This class represents a non-playable character (NPC) entity.
OBJ_Armor
Represents an armor object in the game.
OBJ_Chest
Represents a chest object in the game, extending the Entity class.
OBJ_Door
Represents a door object in the game, extending the Entity class.
OBJ_Potion_Health
Represents a Health Potion object in the game.
OBJ_Potion_Mana
Represents a Mana Potion object in the game.
OBJ_Stairs
Represents a stairs object in the game, extending the Entity class.
OBJ_Weapon
Represents a weapon object in the game.
OBJ_WEAPON_Bash
Represents a bashing-type weapon in the game, extending the OBJ_Weapon class.
OBJ_WEAPON_Piercing
Represents a piercing-type weapon in the game, extending the OBJ_Weapon class.
OBJ_WEAPON_Slash
Represents a slashing-type weapon in the game, extending the OBJ_Weapon class.
Opcion
Represents an option in a negotiation question.
partyManager
This class manages the player's party, which consists of a leader and a list of party members.
PathFinder
The PathFinder class provides functionality for pathfinding using the A* algorithm.
Player
The Player class represents the main character in the game.
Player_Prot1
The Player_Prot1 class is a specific player character class that extends the Player class.
Pregunta
Represents a question in a negotiation.
PreguntaJson
Represents a JSON object containing a list of questions for negotiation.
RandomDungeonGenerator
Generates a random dungeon layout using a simple algorithm.
SaveLoad
The SaveLoad class is responsible for saving and loading game data, including player stats, inventory, and game objects.
shadowStandar
Represents a standard shadow monster in the game.
Sound
The Sound class manages audio clips for the game.
SpellManager
This class is a spell manager that loads and stores the spells available for the game.
superMagic
This class represents a super magic spell that can be used in the game.
Tile
Represents a tile in the game world.
TileManager
Manages tiles and the game world map.
Toolbox
The Toolbox class provides utility methods for image manipulation.
UI
This class represents the user interface (UI) for the game.
